abstract: Jabari Asim reviews children's books Freedom Over Me: Eleven Slaves, Their Lives and Dreams Brought to Life, written and illustrated by Ashley Bryan, My Name is James Madison Hemings, written by Jonah Winter and illustrated by Terry Widener, In the Shadow of Liberty: The Hidden History of Slavery, Four Presidents, and Five Black Lives by Kenneth C Davis.

headline.main: Black Lives Didn’t Matter: New Children’s Books Tell Slaves’ Real Stories

snippet: Three new books tell the truth about slavery with sensitivity and historical accuracy....
lead_paragraph: Three new books tell the truth about slavery with sensitivity and historical accuracy.
